creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: diamond-shaped basket with wider base; tiny, intricate weave patterns alternating between open and closed weave; small decorative coils and knots on some patterns; tall handle with ring at center of either side just above basket lip; black lacquered copper lined cylinder
marks: Signature incised bottom: [ 竹阿弥造之]
title: Chinese-Style Flower Basket
